title: Act of Creation
content:

    --header-subtitle: "1 Minute to Midnight";
}

[[div class="generic red" style="clip-path: none; border-radius: 4px;"]]
[[div class="doc"]]
PERSONNEL FILE -- PIERRE GAUTHIER (ATTACHMENT 1)
[[/div]]
[[image WARPAINT.jpg]]
[[=]]
Stained red from the [[[warpaint]]] of our own personal battles, transformation is not always the effortless process it's made out to be. But it is still one we survive, as after all, should we not take part in the act of creation that lets us turn wheat into bread and fruit into wine? 

Fanart for [[user Rounderhouse]], of his character Captain Gauthier. 
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
